accessKey.label: Access key
accessKey.helper: Your S3 access key ID for authentication

secretKey.label: Secret key
secretKey.helper: Your S3 secret access key for authentication

region.label: Region
region.helper: AWS region where your S3 buckets are located (e.g., us-east-1)

endpoint.label: Endpoint
endpoint.helper: S3 endpoint URL (leave empty to use AWS default)

defaultBucket.label: Default Bucket
defaultBucket.helper: Default bucket to use for storage operations

huggingface.testSuccess: You are using the token named: {{tokenName}}

concurrency.label: Max Concurrent Transfers: {{value}}
concurrency.helper: Maximum number of simultaneous file transfers (1-10)

pagination.label: Max Files Per Page: {{value}}
pagination.helper: Maximum number of files displayed per page
